title: Normal Draft?
body:
I'm not sure what the deal is here, I only xfered here from NA recently, has riot made any statement about Drafted Normal games on OCE?

Is there an overwhelming majority who want blind pick on oce?

replies.body:
I don't think there's a single player on **OCE** who wouldn't want Normal Draft Pick implemented, sadly our player base isn't large enough to accommodate two normal queues ATM.

This was the most recent statement from **Riot Sephyre** in case you're interested:
> [{quoted}](name=Sephyre,realm=OCE,application-id=3fteLeTW,discussion-id=VdoPT9GX,comment-id=00010000,timestamp=2016-04-11T00:58:27.786+0000)
>
> Normal Draft is not likely to be opened up anytime soon. That said, we do evaluate for it, and if we grow to the point of being able to support it we would open it up.

Yeah, guess i'll be sticking to ranked for when I want to Rift. Too many babies in blind pick who troll the instant they lose their pick and grief entire games for 30 minutes. Waste of life.

One every second game at the moment, whether my team or the enemy.
unless im in a premade i cant practice any champions in normals because im support 80% of the time.

They promised us Normal Draft Pick when "Solo Que" came out. Alas Solo Que was scraped, so I guess so are the plans to give us normal draft too.

Now we have to wait for the new champion select to be moved to normals before we can get it, which by the looks of things, won't be happening this year.
They did the same thing with solo queue on NA, but they still gave NA Normal Draft

NA has always had Draft Normals. OCE used to have it and they took it away probably about 2 years ago if i remember correctly. The reason behind it was that the que times were too long to warrant keeping it.

Teambuilder was the next big idea to make normals better. But after a month the que times for that went to over 20mins too and that was then taken away.

Facing facts, OCE isn't big enough to support 2 normal game ques, and you can't have only draft since the "OP" champions would then NEVER be played and it would pose a bit of a problem.

Can't sell skins for reworked/released broken op champ because banned so leaving blind normals means people can play their broken champs and roflstomp until rito nerf.
Meanwhile community sick to death of not being able to ban and important items being nerfed so broken OP champs can roflstomp harder.

Our community has an overwhelming issue with salty attitudes and "conformity" that if you use a bit of logic, its not logical why they do it, and why they get so angry. I refer to the "type your role in char select chat and rage if anyone tries to ask if you may go there instead" and if you refuse to be stuck in a role you are not confident or good in, its all your fault... 

This is most common with people who have really quick loadins, me, im always one of the last... but if everyone zergs roles and tries to force me to supp, i either refuse or get creative and try something new, both of which gets rage. 

I'm happy to supp, im not happy being forced into doing it and basing my game around making someone else look good. I am a team player, i try with any setup, i can see how it may work, i think outside the box. 

My current love is Xin Zhao; i do NOT in any way play him as a jungler, i'd take any lane role instead, top obviously being the prefered. But as nobody wants to sup, im currently forced to play in Supp... Turns out it's a strong "supp" as in s+ ranked twice in a row and still end up snowballing, i just don't get my early game dominance and im aware. I get a relic to get "some farm" and help "supp" and build into my usual damage with creative (if needed, it hasn't been so far) defensive items. Xin using supp role.... Not as strong early, yes i admit.... but you end up having a strong mid/late game anyways, roam often, realize you're probably as strong or stronger than the jungler and go for a counter roam / roam into mid, you'll pick up something usually. 

It is not his best role, but i refuse to be forced to play in ways i dont enjoy in normals.


Honestly, i do understand draft pick.... But i also think it's time dynamic ques moved into normal, not just ranked play. It would avoid this argument which is mostly with younger players who cannot be mature, chat with team and find a middle ground everyone is happy with. 

OCE is all about "Me" "Im the best, support me, i'll carry, ill be the god" and nobody wants to do anything else. Try and say you're not their slave/bi*ch... raaaage, toxicity, threats of reports, afk's the works. Especially when people can't see a stronger option being offered and more viable in the role, but no... rarely any compromise. 

ATM i enjoy breaking metamoulds in normal till i find some people for ranked who i enjoy their attitude and skills, don't care if you're a challenger, if your attitude sucks. I don't want to be in your game. I'd rather play against you and do my best to shut you down and mock your attitude in the end. (those players generally rage at teammates for not basing their games around making sure that champ is as awesome looking as possible)
